GSD.description:
drivers: staging: rtl8192bs: Fix deadlock in rtw_joinbss_event_prehandle()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.15 by commit 1f6c99b94ca3caad346876b3e22e3ca3d25bc8ee. For more details please see the references link.
